author: NileRed
description:
👉 To learn for free on Brilliant, go to https://brilliant.org/NileRed/ or scan the QR code onscreen. Brilliant has also given our viewers 20% off an annual premium subscription, which gives you unlimited daily access to everything they have to offer.

For as long as I can remember, I've always been fascinated by liquid nitrogen and I've always wanted to be able to make it myself, but I never did because it just seemed too difficult. Recently though, for some unknown reason, I felt that I was ready to try doing it, despite having basically no experience with stuff like this, and I decided to just go for it.

title: Making liquid nitrogen from scratch (an absurd amount)
